en.title: Application submitted
en.subTitle: Now that you have submitted your application:
list: the court will be in touch with you to explain what will happen next and what you will need to do

if you have informed the court that you need specific adjustments in order to take part in the case, the court will contact you to confirm what has been arranged. If you have not heard from the court within 3 days of the hearing, contact the court directly. You can find a court or tribunal's contact details on GOV.UK
